io.confluent.ksql.test.util.secure

Class ServerKeyStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.confluent.ksql.test.util.secure.ServerKeyStore

  • public final class ServerKeyStore
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper for creating a client key store to enable SSL in tests.

    • Method Detail

      • keyStoreProps

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> keyStoreProps()
        Returns:
        props brokers will need to connect to support SSL connections. The store at this path may be replaced with an expired store via the method writeExpiredServerKeyStore().

      • clientKeyStoreProps

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> clientKeyStoreProps()
        Returns:
        props clients may use to connect to support SSL connections. In contrast to keyStoreProps(), the store at this path will not replaced with an expired store when the method writeExpiredServerKeyStore() is called.
